achievementbadges-anon-text: Please log in to view achievements.
achievements-summary:
This feature is still in beta.
* You can use if [[Special:Preferences#mw-prefsection-betafeatures|enable]] it.
* Achievements can be deleted without notice.
* Achievement(s) earned during the beta period can be initialized
This is a list of achievements.
achievementbadges-beta-feature-achieveme: Earn given achievements to get badges.
achievementbadges-pref-tooltip-achieveme: Notify me when I obtain an achievement.
log-description-achievementbadges: This is a log shows a list of achievements a user earned.
achievement-hint-enable-achievement-badg: Enable Achievement Badges on [[Special:Preferences#mw-prefsection-betafeatures|the Beta features of Preferences]].
achievement-description-enable-achieveme: You enabled Achievement Badges! Please keep in mind the captions of beta.
achievement-description-sign-up: You are now a contributor of {{SITENAME}}!
achievement-description-edit-page2: You achieved editing {{SITENAME}} 10 times! You are a hope of {{SITENAME}}.
achievement-description-edit-page3: You achieved editing {{SITENAME}} 100 times! Your edit speed is getting faster.
achievement-hint-edit-page4: Keep continue editing. It is a little hard to achieve this achievement.
achievement-description-edit-page4: You achieved editing {{SITENAME}} 1000 times! Your hobby is {{SITENAME}} now.
achievement-hint-edit-page5: Keep continue editing. This achievement is very difficult to achieve.
achievement-description-edit-page5: You achieved editing {{SITENAME}} 10000 times! You are the editor-in-chief of {{SITENAME}} who no one to follow.
achievement-description-long-user-page: You created your user page and introduced yourself!
